report.title: MNHNL Location Search 2
report.description: Form Internal Report: To be used when searching locations for attributes which match a value: index two, which means third attribute.
report.query: SELECT lav3.text_value attr_value3, count(*) count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav3 ON lav3.location_id = l.id and lav3.deleted = FALSE and lav3.location_attribute_id = #location_attr_3_id# WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 from location_attribute_values lav1 WHERE lav1.location_id = l.id and lav1.deleted = FALSE and lav1.text_value = '#location_attr_1_value#' and lav1.location_attribute_id = #location_attr_1_id#) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 from location_attribute_values lav2 WHERE lav2.location_id = l.id and lav2.deleted = FALSE and lav2.text_value = '#location_attr_2_value#' and lav2.location_attribute_id = #location_attr_2_id#) AND l.location_type_id = #location_type_id# GROUP BY lav3.text_value ORDER BY lav3.text_value
